doc.repnme: Transcript of one hundred third special meeting of Executive Directors, held on Monday, November 28, 1955 : South Africa - Third Transport Project
doc.abstracts: This partial transcript, from the session of the Executive Directors held on Monday, November 28, 1955, covers only a proposed loan to the Union of South Africa for the Third Transport Project. In addition to covering the details of the loan, the meeting also provided an overview of the political and economic landscape of South Africa as of 1955. In particular, the issue of race relations and the possible risk to economic growth received considerable attention. The Executive Directors resolved to approve the loan.
